title: Businesses looking to diversify find room for growth in hospitality space
description: Entrepreneurs from various industries in tier-2 and -3 cities in India are entering the hospitality sector, diversifying their business portfolios. Sharad Agarwal, franchisee owner of Delhi Public School (DPS), is partnering with a luxury hotel chain to start his first hospitality venture in Siliguri. Mankind Pharma has also entered the sector with two hotels, and other companies are following suit.
